solution_line_template: The number of apples remaining after Jack gave his father {apples_for_father} is {total_apples} - {apples_for_father} = <<{total_apples}-{apples_for_father}={remaining_apples}>>{remaining_apples}.
The share each one of his friends including him will get is {remaining_apples} / {number_of_people_sharing} = <<{remaining_apples}/{number_of_people_sharing}={apples_per_person}>>{apples_per_person}.
